aoc-custom/components/common/footer-scri:
<!-- SMOOTH SCROLL -->
        <script>
            $(document).ready(function(){
                window.scrollBy({  
                    top: 0,
                    behavior: 'smooth' 
                    });

            });
        </script>
<!-- ANIMATION -->
        <script type="text/javascript" >
            var $animation_elements = $('.animation-element');
            var $window = $(window);
            var refresherIndex;

            function check_if_in_view() {
            var window_height = $window.height();
            var window_top_position = $window.scrollTop();
            var window_bottom_position = (window_top_position + window_height);

            $.each($animation_elements, function() {
                var $element = $(this);
                var element_height = $element.outerHeight();
                var element_top_position = $element.offset().top;
                var element_bottom_position = (element_top_position + element_height);
            
                //check to see if this current container is within viewport
                if ((element_bottom_position >= window_top_position) &&
                    ((element_top_position+60) <= window_bottom_position)) {
                    $element.addClass('in-view');
                    $element.addClass('_refresher'); 
                    var refresherIndex = setInterval(function(){ _view_refresher($element); }, 300000);

                } else {
                    $element.removeClass('in-view');
                    $element.removeClass('_refresher'); 
                    
                    clearInterval(refresherIndex);
                }
            });
            }

            function _view_refresher($element){
                if($element.hasClass( "_refresher" )){
                    $element.removeClass('in-view');
                    $refresher = setTimeout(function() {
                        $element.addClass('in-view');
                    }, 250);
                    
                }	
            }

            $window.on('scroll resize', 
                function(){
                    if($window.width() > 800){
                        check_if_in_view();
                    }
                }
            );
            $window.trigger('scroll');
        </script>

        <script>
            var acc = document.getElementsByClassName("custom-accordion");
            var i;

            for (i = 0; i < acc.length; i++) {
            acc[i].addEventListener("click", function() {
                this.classList.toggle("active");
                var panel = this.nextElementSibling;
                if (panel.style.display === "block") {
                panel.style.display = "none";
                } else {
                panel.style.display = "block";
                }
            });
            }
        </script>

<!-- BY NEED AJAX -->

aoc-custom/components/custom/cbd-bath:
Cbd Bath Bombs

Refresh, relax, rejuvenate revitalize with our CBD bath bombs. Ingredients
derived from premium hemp extract and fortified with soothing fragrances, our
bath bombs allow you to enjoy the CBD experience anytime - day or night. Choose
from a variety of non-staining, absorption safe colors and scents.

{{#if category.subcategories}} {{#each category.subcategories}}

{{name}}

{{#if image}} {{else}} {{/if}}
$14.99 - $49.99
 
Shop {{name}}
{{/each}} {{/if}}

Third-Party
Lab Test

Usa Hemp

Superior
Broad Spectrum

  Non-Thc1

  Gmp Certified

CBD Bath Bombs

Acceleration Brands provides a refreshing way to revitalize and relax in the tub. Our specially curated collection of CBD bath bombs comes loaded with a variety of strengths and an array of different scents to choose from: lavender, frankincense, eucalyptus, and blend. Each CBD bath bomb for sale is produced with coloring that won't leave any unwanted stains. Rethink bath time!.

Properties of CBD Bath Bombs

CBD bath bombs provide everyday support in a relaxing application. In contrast to other products, these will enable you to soak your entire body in a rejuvenating combination of CBD, essentials oils, Epsom salt, and natural aromatic fragrances. Each essential oil gives each CBD bath bomb different benefints:

Lavender, which infuses Relax and Resist, is popular in soaps and cleaners for its antiseptic and soothing powers, along with its fresh, wood-like scent. Research indicates that inhaling lavender can be especially relaxing. Eucalyptus, in Revive and Rejuvenate, is a popular ingredient in cough and cold medicines. A good choice if you're suffering from stuffiness or allergies.

Frankincense, used for thousands of years in churches and sacred ceremonies, is the key ingredient in Resist. The rich and otherworldy scent is perfect for soothing away the stress of every day.

Why Choose Us?

CBD BATH BOMBS APPLICATION

With CBD bath bombs, it's simple: fill your tub with water, drop in your bath bomb, sit, soak, and enjoy real relaxation! We recommend a 30-minute soak for the full benefits. If you're having trouble sleeping, using a CBD bath one or two hours before bed may be especially helpful.

WHY CHOOSE OUR SELECTION OF BATH BOMBS

We are committed to giving you the highest-quality CBD products at an affordable price - including our CBD bath bombs. Our currated selection uses only CBD extracted from non-GMO hemp grown here in the U.S., ensuring that everything is THC-free* while providing all the wholesome properties you expect from premium CBD oil.

Frequently Asked Questions

CBD bath bombs enhance a relaxing soak in the tub with CBD, scented essentials oils, and Epsom salt. People who live an active lifestyle find them especially helpful after a tough workout.

Individual responses to CBD vary, but most find it more effective with regular use, as CBD can accumulate in the body over time. Many people feel immediate support, especially since soaking in hot water can itself be helpful for soreness and discomfort.

No. All of our CBD products are THC free.*

*THC-free is defined as below the level of detection using validated scientific methods.

No. Our THC free* CBD bath bombs for sale are strictly non-intoxicating.

We recommend taking at least 30 minutes to experience the full effects of CBD bath bombs. Maintaining regular use for at least 30 days will assist with best results.

aoc-custom/components/custom/cbd-capsule:
Cbd Capsules

Our easy-to-swallong CBD capsules come in variety of counts, formats and CBD
concentrations ranging from 450 mg to 3000 mg. Available as CBD softgels or
traditional CBD pills, enjoy the benefits of wholesome ingredients fortified by
premium hemp derived extracts.

{{#if category.products}} {{> aoc-custom/components/category/product-listing}} {{else}}

{{lang 'categories.no_products'}}

{{/if}} {{{region name="category_below_content"}}}

Third-Party
Lab Test

Usa Hemp

Superior
Broad Spectrum

  Non-Thc1

  Gmp Certified

CBD Oil Capsules

Get a precise amount of CBD with small, easy-to-swallow CBD oil capsules. Choose from a variety of convenient counts, formats and CBD concentrations ranging from 450 mg to 3000 mg per bottle - no guesswork required. CBD oil capsules can be used daily and work soon after digesting.

Properties of CBD Oil Capsules

The primary advantage of CBD oil capsules is the ease with which users can measure their intake. While CBD products like tinctures can be measured out there is always a small amount of variation between each serving. With CBD oil capsules, you can eliminate the guesswork, knowing exactly how much CBD oil is in each capsule. They are easily transportable and make a good option for people who need to take CBD on the go.

CBD Capsule Application

CBD oil capsules are an easy, measured way to get your daily CBD - all you need is a glass of water. Recommended intake method is simply taking the pill orally with a beverage to help wash it down at the same time each day.

WHY CHOOSE FROM OUR CURRATED SELECTION OF CBD CAPSULES AND CBD SOFTGELS?

There are many CBD capsules for sale out there, our curated selection includes the only brand that uses a proprietary Superior Broad Spectrum CBD formula.

CBD TINCTURES VS. CBD CAPSULES

CBD tinctures and CBD oil capsules are both great for a daily CBD routine, delivering Superior Broad Spectrum CBD formula with few extra ingredients. So why choose one over the other?

CBD tinctures can be faster-acting if you take the CBD oil under your tongue and absorb it through the membrane. With that method you might feel the effects faster, compared to a slower release with ingested CBD.

However, to do that, you need to hold the oil in your mouth for up to 60 seconds before swallowing, so a CBD oil pill is usually faster to actually take - simply swallow the capsule with a sip of water. Moreover, while you have to follow the quantity of tincture that you take carefully, each CBD capsule and softgel has a precisely measured amount of CBD in it, so you can easily keep track of how much you're taking.

CBD tablets also don't have the spill risk of oils, so they're suitable for taking with you on the go.
aoc-custom/components/custom/cbd-cbg-lip:
Cbd + CBG Liposomals

Broad-spectrum CBD is one of the main forms of cannabidiol (CBD). Broad-spectrum CBD products contain various compounds and cannabinoids from the cannabis plant, including cannabichromene (CBC), Cannabigerol (CBG) cannabinol (CBN), and terpenes, such as myrcene, limonene, or pinene.

{{#if category.subcategories}} {{#each category.subcategories}}

{{name}}

{{#if image}} {{else}} {{/if}}
$14.99 - $49.99
 
Shop {{name}}
{{/each}} {{/if}}

Third-Party
Lab Test

Usa Hemp

Superior
Broad Spectrum

  Non-Thc1

  Gmp Certified

How is CBG (cannabigerol) Made?

Cannabigerol (CBG) s present in low levels (usually less than 1%) in most cannabis strains, CBG is considered a minor cannabinoid. Cannabis plants produce cannabigerolic acid (CBGA), the precursor to the three main cannabinoid lines: tetrahydrocannabinolic acid (THCA), cannabidiolic acid (CBDA), and cannabichromenic acid (CBCA).

CBG's Potential Benefits.

The human bodys built-in endocannabinoid system (ECS) works to keep the body in its balanced state of homeostasis. While there are specific details about how cannabinoids work, in general the endocannabinoid system performs different functions specific to each area of the body.

What is CBG:

Cannabigerol is one of more than 120 identified cannabinoid compounds found in the plant genus Cannabis. Cannabigerol is the decarboxylated form of cannabigerolic acid, the parent molecule from which other cannabinoids are synthesized. Cannabigerol is a minor constituent of cannabis.

FULL SPECTRUM
VS BROAD SPECTRUM

Similar to the full spectrum entourage effect, our Superior Broad Spectrum CBD formula also offers a whole-body experience just minus any THC. And like full spectrum CBD, our specialized Superior Broad Spectrum retains all of the helpful cannabinoids from its extraction, including terpenes and flavonoids; but it removes any trace amounts of THC, allowing the entourage effect without any additional worries or risks. Whether you decide to use our Superior Broad Spectrum formula or our other brand-new full spectrum CBD oil will depend on your personal preference. Each one has its benefits depending on why youre using it. Both of them offer a whole-plant impact, which is far more significant than CBD isolate; however, our full spectrum CBD includes minimal THC content, while our Superior Broad Spectrum is THC-free.* To learn even more about the differences, check out our in-depth analysis, The Difference Between Full Spectrum and Broad Spectrum CBD.

Frequently Asked Questions

Everyone's body is different. As a result, the time it takes for CBD oil tinctures to work will vary for each person. Some may notice a difference soon after initial use, while others may take longer. We suggest giving yourself at least 30 days of daily use with CBD oil drops to determine how your body responds.

Simply unscrew the cap, fill the dropper (dropper will only fill about halfway, indicating one serving), and place the CBD oil drops under your tongue and swallow. Make sure to always shake the tincture bottle well before each use, then take one or two servings either in the morning or at night. Allow for 30 days of continued use to experience the best results and adjust as needed.

All of our products are THC-free.* This means that there is no THC detectable by current validated scientific analytical tools. All of our products undergo thorough testing at independent, third-party labs that are ISO-certified with a Certificate of Analysis (CoA) posted online for every batch.

Our suppliers craft their products to remove THC while always preserving CBD, additional cannabinoids (CBG and CBN), and terpenes for a superior plant profile.

CBD oil is a product containing just CBD no additional cannabinoids, terpenes, etc. Hemp oil, on the other hand, is a variable term that is often used to describe products without consistency. Hemp oil is a very broad term that may result in broad-spectrum, full-spectrum, or isolate products.

Everyone has a unique shape, and size. The best number of CBD oil drops to take will vary for each person. Start with a small amount and slowly increase with each use until you know the right number of drops for you. We recommend taking one or two servings per day and allowing up to 30 days of daily use to know how your body responds.

aoc-custom/components/custom/cbd-for-pet:
BUY CBD FOR PETS

Discover our complete line of CBD for pets from cbdMD. High quality hemp derived ingredients are veterinarian formulated for the pets in your life. Get CBD products for dogs and CBD products for cats made for their needs. Buy CBD pet products for sale below.

CBD For Pets

Whether your furry family members include dogs or cats, our CBD for pets will let them enjoy the same CBD goodness that humans do. By combining all the properties of CBD oil with animal-approved flavors, we've found the perfect combo of natural support.

Show the animals in your life the love they deserve by giving them CBD as a tasty treat, an easy-to-use tincture, or as a chewable. With an entire suite of hemp-derived, THC-free* CBD products using our innovative process, we've developed the perfect way to deliver naturally sourced CBD for pets.

Our variety of chewables, treats, and tinctures will please even the fussiest eaters, making it easy and convenient for daily use. The latest line of topicals for pets delivers soothing support for animals both young and old. Trust us when we say our CBD is made for all walks of life!

Why Choose Us?

How to Give CBD to Pets

CBD intake varies between different species, sizes, and shapes. We advise starting with the lowest indicated measurement and closely monitoring your pet's progress. When starting a CBD regimen, it's generally suggested to maintain a steady routine for at least 30 days to achieve optimal wellness. If you don't see desired results after the initial , gradually increase the daily serving size

Properties of CBD for Pets

Our selection of products use the same Superior Broad Spectrum CBD formula that's found in our high-quality human products, combined with the flavors and textures that your cat or dog will love. Our curated selection of products has a range of strengths and concentrations lets you tailor your CBD for pets program to the size and needs of your animal companion.

Frequently Asked Questions

Our selection of products use the same Superior Broad Spectrum CBD formula that's found in our high-quality human products, combined with the flavors and textures that your cat or dog will love. Our curated selection of products has a range of strengths and concentrations lets you tailor your CBD for pets program to the size and needs of your animal companion.

Our selection of CBD for dogs and CBD for cats have been veterinarian-formulated with pet-safe ingredients in every tincture, topical, and hard chew to support their wellness and provide optimum results. Although CBD offers the same benefits of high quality hemp extracts and terpenes to animals as it does to humans, it is always best to use only those products that have been made specifically for pets to ensure quality, safety, and effectiveness.

The premium hemp extracts in CBD for pets offers the same benefits to animals as it does to humans. CBD works by interacting with the endocannabinoid system thats present in both people and pets. Because of this similarity in physiology, both can be positively affected by CBD in similar ways. Pets in need of wellness support, extra calm, or a daily boost to their health may benefit from CBD's powerful properties that promote balance throughout the body. Check out our blog to help determine which CBD product is right for your pet.

CBD for pets is designed to complement your cat or dogs everyday wellness, support an overall sense of calm, and help manage signs of common daily stress or discomfort. There is a growing number of happy owners who give their pets CBD for daily wellness and stress support In some cases, owners have reported good results for common challenges such as separation issues and even noise aversion.

WHAT ARE CBD GUMMIES?

CBD gummies are edible CBD candy that can be used every day! The best part is that you can trust youre getting the same premium ingredients as all our other CBD products. Consistent, true levels of select terpenes and cannabinoids (like CBG and CBN) help ensure that youre getting the exact same product every time. As one of our most popular products, CBD gummies offer you all the benefits of CBD in a sweet solution. The perfect calming CBD candy to add to any wellness routine, these CBD edibles are easy to use. Try taking a gummy whenever you need a boost or whenever youre in need of some relaxation. This fan favorite product results in some of the best CBD gummies available.

ABOUT CBD GUMMIES

Our curated gummies provide all the benefits of CBD gummies with quality and consistency you can rely on.

Why Choose Us?

WHAT DO CBD GUMMIES DO?

All CBD gummies support the endocannabinoid system, which helps your body maintain its balance and sense of well-being. Some of the most popular uses of CBD gummies are maintaining a sense of calm, managing everyday stress, aiding exercise recovery, and supporting overall wellness. Beyond that, there are different kinds of CBD gummies with different purposes, depending on your needs and preference.

Why Choose Gummies?

CBD gummies are a delicious and consistent way to add CBD benefits to your daily wellness routine! Its a simple way to bring balance and support to your life.

Frequently Asked Questions

CBD gummies cannot get you high if they only contain CBD. The only reason a CBD product could get you high is if it uses full-spectrum hemp extract, which contains THC.

CBD gummies are legal, just like all hemp-derived CBD products. The 2018 Farm Bill made all CBD products federally legal when derived from hemp plants containing less than 0.3% THC by dry weight. Individual states can still decide whether to allow the sale of CBD products.

The number of CBD gummies you should eat depends on multiple things: your size, age, and activity level, the type of gummy youre using, and what your desired results are. We recommend starting with one gummy every morning and evening for 30 days and monitoring how you feel. If you arent getting the desired results, add another one and repeat the process.

Hemp gummies are not approved for the treatment of pain unless they contain added medicines specifically for that purpose, as some of our CBD topicals do. Many people find that their calming qualities help discomfort related to stress and muscle tension. CBD may also help maintain good sleep cycles, which is an important part of pain management.

Taking CBD gummies is easy and fun: just take one out and eat it! The main challenge is not binging on these tasty candies. Pace yourself so you get a regular amount of CBD every day. If youre already taking oral CBD regularly in the form of a CBD oil tincture or CBD capsule, you can also pop a gummy or two as a bonus whenever you want some extra calm.

CBD Liposomals

Natural Native has taken the natural benefits of hemp extracts and given them a scientific boost. By embedding the phytocannabinoids within naturally occurring liposomal phospholipids Natural Natives Hemp Extract Sprays are up to five times (5X) more bioavailable than hemp extracts taken alone. This means that you can get the same effect from a much lower dose!

Why do Liposomes help absorption?

Every cell in your body has what is known as a cell membrane. It is the wall that surrounds the cell and keeps bad things out and good things in. This membrane is made up of two layers of phospholipids, a phospholipid bi-layer. Phospholipids are basically just phosphorus molecules connected to the end of fat molecules. Liposomes are tiny spheres made from cholesterol and naturally-occurring phospholipids. These spheres can surround certain types of compounds and nutrients like Vitamin C, Vitamin E, CoQ10 and CBD and when they enter or come in contact with the cells of the body they are able to feed the cell membranes with the phospholipids and deliver the nutrients contained within them directly to the cells.

Why Choose Us?

A SUPERIOR HEMP EXTRACT DELIVERY SYSTEM

The delivery method represents a breakthrough in hemp extract consumption. Engineered for purity, bioavailability and convenience, a superior hemp extract delivery system in an easy-to-use spray. The formula is atomized and broken down into tiny hemp extract particles for sublingual absorption, by-passing the digestive process that traditional hemp extract tinctures must undergo.

QUALITY FROM THE SOURCE:

Our hemp extract is derived from hemp grown in US using organic standards. This ensures there are no harmful herbicides, pesticides or other dangerous chemicals used during cultivation.

YOU DESERVE THE BEST!

The final result is a, high-potency hemp extract thats easy to use on the go. Because of the advanced delivery system, youre getting the beneficial effects of hemp extract within 2-3 minutes of use.

Frequently Asked Questions

CBD oil is made by extracting CBD isolates from industrial hemp and then infused into a carrier oil. There are many ways to extract CBD isolates from raw hemp material some methods allow the retention of other beneficial cannabinoids and terpenes. The carrier oil is usually a type of coconut-based oil or palm kernel oil.

There are several different ways you can use CBD oil, depending on your purpose for using it. You can use CBD for temporary relief from pain and soreness by applying a generous amount of topical cream into the skin or soaking in water with a bath bomb. Or CBD could be helpful for general wellness with a few tincture drops or a couple of capsules in the morning or evening. And for sleep, a dropper full from a CBD sleep aid or a softgel before bed may help.

However, consistency is essential for achieving the best results; you should take CBD daily for at least 30 days to know how well it works for you

CBD oil works by interacting with a bodily system known as the endocannabinoid system (or ECS). The primary function of our ECS is to maintain homeostasis, which is our bodies' natural balance to perform and operate efficiently against external and internal stressors.

CBD Sleep Aids

Are you wondering how to get better sleep? Our CBD oil for sleep comes with an easy-to-use dropper, simply fill one dropper (it will fill about halfway indicating one serving), place it under your tongue for one to two minutes, and swallow - it's that simple! Our other CBD PM product is our softgel which is an easy sleep pill format that you can take just before bedtime. These CBD PM products work best when taken about 30 minutes before bed.

PROPERTIES OF CBD PM

Our CBD sleep products blend THC free* Superior Broad Spectrum CBD hemp extracts and melatonin - a hormone that helps regulate your sleep cycle - along with traditional ingredients such as chamomile flower, valerian root, lemon balm, and much more! This powerful combination of CBD and melatonin helps induce calm while promoting a more restful night's sleep.

HOW TO TAKE CBD SLEEP PRODUCTS

The properties of CBD PM are generally felt within 30 minutes, so you will want to make sure you take it right before bed. By combining a proprietary sleep blend with the power of CBD and melatonin, you will experience how CBD sleep products work to help relax your nights and refresh your mornings. CBD PM OIL TINCTURES FOR SLEEP

CBD PM Oil Tinctures for Sleep are a precise and potent way to add CBD to your nightly routine and encourage restful sleep. Tinctures are one of the most bioavailable CBD products. Enjoy the benefits of every drop of CBD oil and bring balance and support to your sleep cycle with our supplier's unique Superior Broad-Spectrum blend.

Frequently Asked Questions

CBD for sleep is a more natural sleep aid that contains CBD and melatonin. A proprietary blend of melatonin is combined with non GMO, vegan, and THC free* CBD oil and other essential ingredients to induce calmness and promotea more restful sleep.

Each tincture bottle contains 150 mg of melatonin (5 mg per serving) per bottle. Softgels contain 3 mg of melatonin per serving, equalling about 90 mg of melatonin per bottle.

CBD Tinctures

The original, the classic, the tried and true a CBD oil tincture provides the simplest, purest, and most versatile way to take your daily CBD. Made with Superior Broad Spectrum CBD formula infused in MCT oil, our CBD tinctures come in a wide range of concentrations so you can tailor your routine for your exact needs.

CBD Tinctures Application

By design, a tincture dropper allows CBD oil drops to be taken quickly and in easy measurements. Our CBD oil tinctures can be placed directly under the tongue and held for one to two minutes before swallowing. If you are new to using CBD tinctures and are unsure of how much to take, it is recommended to maintain a daily regimen for at least 30 days to experience full results.

Why Chose Our Tinctures?

The base of all our CBD oil tinctures is Superior Broad Spectrum CBD extract and pure MCT oil, one of the best fats on the market. The only other ingredient is flavoring, including berry, mint, and orange and several more. We also offer a natural-flavored tincture for those who prefer less sweetness. That way, you know youve got the purest, highest-quality broad spectrum CBD oil tincture there is.

Get Creative!!!!

WHILE ABSORPTION UNDER THE TONGUE IS THE FASTEST-ACTING METHOD, ONE OF THE GREAT THINGS ABOUT CBD OIL TINCTURES IS THAT YOU CAN WORK THEM INTO FOOD AND DRINKS. FOR INSTANCE:

CBD Cooked Baked:

Use our natural CBD tincture to make your own protein shake, or in place of vegetable oil in baked goods and sauces.

CBD Smoothies

Incorporate your favorite flavored and non-flavored CBD oil tincture into your favorite smoothie recipe, or blend it with plain yogurt for a tasty snack.

CBD-Infused Drinks

Add a few drops of mint CBD oil tincture to a cup of green tea a mojito, or any mint-flavored drink. Or add it to a chocolate sauce for extra zing!

Frequently Asked Questions

Everyone's body is different. As a result, the time it takes for CBD oil tinctures to work will vary for each person. Some may notice a difference soon after initial use, while others may take longer. We suggest giving yourself at least 30 days of daily use with CBD oil drops to determine how your body responds.

Simply unscrew the cap, fill the dropper (dropper will only fill about halfway, indicating one serving), and place the CBD oil drops under your tongue and swallow. Make sure to always shake the tincture bottle well before each use, then take one or two servings either in the morning or at night. Allow for 30 days of continued use to experience the best results and adjust as needed.

All of our products are THC-free.* This means that there is no THC detectable by current validated scientific analytical tools. All of our products undergo thorough testing at independent, third-party labs that are ISO-certified with a Certificate of Analysis (CoA) posted online for every batch.

Our suppliers craft their products to remove THC while always preserving CBD, additional cannabinoids (CBG and CBN), and terpenes for a superior plant profile.

CBD oil is a product containing just CBD no additional cannabinoids, terpenes, etc. Hemp oil, on the other hand, is a variable term that is often used to describe products without consistency. Hemp oil is a very broad term that may result in broad-spectrum, full-spectrum, or isolate products.

Everyone has a unique shape, and size. The best number of CBD oil drops to take will vary for each person. Start with a small amount and slowly increase with each use until you know the right number of drops for you. We recommend taking one or two servings per day and allowing up to 30 days of daily use to know how your body responds.

CBD TOPICAL PRODUCTS

  • CBD BODY BALM

    CBD body balm is for more intense moisturizing of rough, dry, cracked skin.

  • CBD Roll-Ons

    CBD Freeze and CBD Roll-ons include ingredients to provide temporary relief from minor aches and pains. Products with menthol provide immediate cooling sensation that can be especially welcoming for people looking to recover from everyday discomfort.

  • LOTIONS

    These products contain essential oils, ideal for daily moisturizing.


  • CBD Lip Balm

    CBD lip balm, is strictly for the lips. We recommend using CBD lip specific products for moisturizing cracked lips.

  • CBD creams & CBD
    Recover creams

    Recover creams for pain include histamine dihydrochloride, along with arnica, MSM, and vitamin B6. Histamine dihydrochloride, similar to menthol, helps provide temporary relief from minor aches and pains, but is provides a warming sensation by increasing blood flow. Therefore it is useful if you are sore from being stiff or tense. All of our creams are richly moisturizing with a many essential oils.

CBD TOPICALS

For support with problem areas of discomfort, choose from CBD Freeze with menthol for cooling relief, CBD Recover with histamine dihydrochloride for soothing warmth, CBD Relieve with lidocaine for anesthetic enhanced aid, CBD Revive for light, daily moisture, and CBD Balms for the heaviest moisture recovery.

PROPERTIES OF CBD TOPICALS

Products such as our CBD tinctures or CBD capsules are great to support overall wellness, but if more direct support is needed, then topicals such as our CBD gels, creams, lotions, and sprays are the products you need.

TOPICAL CBD APPLICATION

Designed with convenience in mind, our CBD topicals come in a variety of applicators including rollers, squeeze tubes, cream tubs, and sprays. Perfect for easy skin application, simply choose a topical that comes in a container best suited for you and apply as needed. Most people will experience its effects interacting soon after application, but to better understand the products potential, a 30-day period of use is suggested.

To Sum It Up

Frequently Asked Questions

CBD topicals consist of creams, lotions, gels, salves, and sprays that are applied directly to the skin always remember, topicals are not intended for oral consumption.

Best for use with topical support, recovery, and discomfort. Our gels, creams, and lotions contain active ingredients such as menthol, histamine dihydrochloride, or lidocaine that aid in pain recovery. In addition, ingredients such as coconut oil, shea butter, essential oils, and other botanicals are added to benefit everyday topical needs.

Gently wash and dry the affected area then apply a generous amount of cream, gel, or lotion onto the affected area and massage into the skin until fully absorbed. For a topical roller, clean the affected area and apply the applicator tip in a dabbing motion directly to the skin. Use more pressure against the skin to increase the fluid application or use less pressure to reduce the amount of fluid applied. For topical spray, clean and dry the affected area then spray an ample amount and let dry till absorbed.

The lasting effects of CBD topical creams, lotions, rollers, salves, and sprays will vary from person to person and can greatly depend upon the size of the affected area and the level of discomfort. Please use accordingly for optimal results and maintain daily use for at least 30 days to effectively assess your personal experience.

There is no one-size-fits-all when applying topical CBD. We recommend starting with an ample amount. Slowly increase the amount with each use until the desired effect is achieved. Maintain a daily regimen of application for at least 30 days to effectively assess individual results.

We suggest applying CBD topicals up to four times daily as needed. Maintain regular use for at least 30 days to achieve optimal results.

components/common/polyfill-script:
<script>
    {{!--
        Check for modern browser features, and load polyfills if browser does not appear to support features
        we need.

            Polyfill approach is all or nothing - please import needed polyfills in /assets/js/polyfills.js

        Inspired by https://philipwalton.com/articles/loading-polyfills-only-when-needed/
            --}}
    function browserSupportsAllFeatures() {
        return window.Promise
            && window.fetch
            && window.URL
            && window.URLSearchParams
            && window.WeakMap
            // object-fit support
            && ('objectFit' in document.documentElement.style);
    }

    function loadScript(src) {
        var js = document.createElement('script');
        js.src = src;
        js.onerror = function () {
            console.error('Failed to load polyfill script ' + src);
        };
        document.head.appendChild(js);
    }

    if (!browserSupportsAllFeatures()) {
        loadScript('{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.polyfills.js'}}');
    }
</script>
components/common/quick-search: {{{ snippet "forms_search"}}}
components/common/responsive-img: {{!-- This file implements the lazysizes srcset pattern (as seen on https://github.com/aFarkas/lazysizes#modern-transparent-srcset-pattern) for maximum performance on modern browsers and reasonable compatibility with legacy browsers. There are a few important arguments to know about when using this component: `lazyload`: - If set to 'lazyload+lqip', will load a low-res image which will be replaced by lazysizes - ensuring that SOME content is shown immediately on page load. Without LQIP, a transparent gif will be used instead, which reduces the number of requests needed to load the page, making it even faster. - If set to 'lazyload', the browser will not load the full-size image at first, instead the lazysizes plugin will load it progressively after page load. This improves the load speed of the page, but it should be disabled for high-priority above-the-fold images. - If set to 'disabled', will not attempt to lazyload the image and instead tell the browser to load it immediately. Use this for high-priority images that are above the fold. `fallback_size`: This is the size to use for this image in legacy browsers that do not support srcset. Can be defined as a pixel bounding-box size (e.g. "123x123) or inherent width (e.g. "123w"). `class`: The CSS classes to add to the image, e.g. "card-image". If lazyloading is enabled, all images will have the "lazyload" class so that lazysizes will target them automatically. `otherAttributes`: Any other HTML attributes you want on the img tag, for example "height='100' width='100'" `default_image`: The default image to use if `image` is undefined or falsy. Should be a theme asset, usually defined as a relative path in the theme config. If a default image is not provided, you'll get an image tag with no image if the primary image is undefined. `lqip_size`: If you want to specify a particular size for the LQIP image, you can do so with this argument. A default of 80 pixels wide will be used otherwise. This argument has no effect if the lazyload mode is not "lazyload+lqip". --}}
components/common/store-logo:
{{#if settings.store_logo.image}}
{{else}} {{settings.store_logo.title}} {{/if}}
components/common/subscription-form:
{{lang 'newsletter.subscribe'}}

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do.

{{#if settings.show_newsletter_summary }}

{{settings.newsletter_summary}}

{{/if}}
components/faceted-search/faceted-search:
{{ title }}
{{#if selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.clear'}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/facets/hierarc:
{{#each this}}
  • {{{sanitize title}}} {{#if ../show_product_counts}} {{#if count}} ({{count}}) {{/if}} {{/if}} {{#if children}} {{> components/faceted-search/facets/hierarchy-children children}} {{/if}}
    • {{/each}}
components/faceted-search/facets/range:
{{> components/faceted-search/faceted-search-navigation}}
{{#if this.sort}} {{/if}}
components/faceted-search/index:
{{> components/faceted-search/selected-facets selected}} {{lang 'search.faceted.hide-filters'}} {{lang 'search.faceted.show-filters'}} {{#any facets visible=true}}
{{#each facets}} {{#if visible}} {{{dynamicComponent 'components/faceted-search/facets'}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/any}}
components/products/filter:
<form class="actionBar sort-products" method="get" data-sort-by="product">
    {{> components/category/sort-box sort=sort}}
</form>
components/products/product-badge:
{{#if badge_view '===' 'sash'}}
{{{badge_label}}}
{{else if badge_view '===' 'topleft'}}
{{{badge_label}}}
{{else if badge_view '===' 'burst'}}
{{{badge_label}}}
{{/if}}
components/products/ratings: {{#for 1 5}} {{#if ../this.rating '>=' $index}} {{else}} {{/if}} {{/for}}
layout/base:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="no-js" lang="{{ locale_name }}">
    <head>
        <title>{{ head.title }}</title>
        {{{ resourceHints }}}
        {{{ head.meta_tags }}}
        {{{ head.config }}}
        {{#block "head"}} {{/block}}

        <link href="{{ head.favicon }}" rel="shortcut icon">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css">
        <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://maxcdn.bootstrapcdn.com/bootstrap/4.0.0/css/bootstrap.min.css" integrity="sha384-Gn5384xqQ1aoWXA+058RXPxPg6fy4IWvTNh0E263XmFcJlSAwiGgFAW/dAiS6JXm" crossorigin="anonymous">
        <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1">

        <script>
            {{!-- Change document class from no-js to js so we can detect this in css --}}
            document.documentElement.className = document.documentElement.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        </script>

        {{> components/common/polyfill-script }}
        <script>window.consentManagerTranslations = `{{{langJson 'consent_manager'}}}`;</script>

        {{!-- Load Lazysizes script ASAP so images will appear --}}
        <script>
            {{!-- Only load visible elements until the onload event fires, after which preload nearby elements. --}}
            window.lazySizesConfig = window.lazySizesConfig || {};
            window.lazySizesConfig.loadMode = 1;
        </script>
        <script async src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.head_async.js'}}"></script>

        <script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/webfont/1.6.26/webfont.js"></script>
        <script src="https://kit.fontawesome.com/5116efd51e.js" crossorigin="anonymous"></script>
        <script src="{{cdn 'assets/jquery-3.3.1.min.js'}}"></script>

        <script>
            WebFont.load({
                custom: {
                    families: ['Karla', 'Roboto', 'Source Sans Pro']
                },
                classes: false
            });
        </script>


        {{ getFontsCollection }}
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/storecustom.css'}}}
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/product-page.css'}}}
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/theme.css'}}}
        {{{stylesheet '/assets/css/animation.css'}}}
        
    
        {{{head.scripts}}}

        {{~inject 'zoomSize' theme_settings.zoom_size}}
        {{~inject 'productSize' theme_settings.product_size}}
        {{~inject 'showAdminBar' theme_settings.show-admin-bar}}
        {{~inject 'genericError' (lang 'common.generic_error')}}
        {{~inject 'maintenanceModeSettings' settings.maintenance}}
        {{~inject 'adminBarLanguage' (langJson 'admin')}}
        {{~inject 'urls' urls}}
        {{~inject 'secureBaseUrl' settings.secure_base_url}}
        {{~inject 'cartId' cart_id}}
        {{~inject 'channelId' settings.channel_id}}
        {{~inject 'template' template}}
        
        {{#if page_type '===' 'product'}}
            {{> components/common/facebook-like}}
        {{else if page_type '===' 'blog' }}
            {{> components/common/facebook-like}}
        {{else if page_type '===' 'blog_post' }}
            {{> components/common/facebook-like}}
        {{/if}}

        <script>
            var theme_settings = {
                show_fast_cart: {{theme_settings.show_fast_cart}},
                linksPerCol: {{theme_settings.nav-links-per-col}},
            };
        </script>

        {{~inject 'validationDictionaryJSON' (langJson 'validation_messages')}}
        {{~inject 'validationFallbackDictionaryJSON' (langJson 'validation_fallback_messages')}}
        {{~inject 'validationDefaultDictionaryJSON' (langJson 'validation_default_messages')}} 
        {{~inject 'carouselArrowAndDotAriaLabel' (lang 'carousel.arrow_and_dot_aria_label')}}
        {{~inject 'carouselActiveDotAriaLabel' (lang 'carousel.active_dot_aria_label')}}
        {{~inject 'carouselContentAnnounceMessage' (lang 'carousel.content_announce_message')}}
    </head>
    <body  class="{{#if template_file '===' 'pages/home'}}home-body{{/if}} {{#if template_file '===' 'pages/page'}}categ-body{{/if}}{{#if template_file '===' 'pages/checkout'}}checkout-body{{/if}}">
        <svg data-src="{{cdn 'img/icon-sprite.svg'}}" class="icons-svg-sprite"></svg>

        {{> aoc-custom/components/common/header }}
        {{> components/common/body }}
        {{> aoc-custom/components/common/footer }}
        {{> aoc-custom/components/common/footer-scripts }}

        <script>window.__webpack_public_path__ = "{{cdn 'assets/dist/'}}";</script>
        <script src="{{cdn 'assets/dist/theme-bundle.main.js'}}"></script>
        <script>
            {{!-- Exported in app.js --}}
            window.stencilBootstrap("{{page_type}}", {{jsContext}}).load();
        </script>
        {{{footer.scripts}}}
    </body>
</html>
